subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Aside from Mirza Teletovic, who had 14 points in Game 2, no reserve has scored in double figures in the playoffs for the Nets, whose depth played a key role in their resurgence this season.
snippet: Aside from Mirza Teletovic, who had 14 points in Game 2, no reserve has scored in double figures in the playoffs for the Nets, whose depth played a key role in their resurgence this season.
